description: This gingerbread, from the chefs Edna Lewis and Scott Peacock, is just wonderful: a little spicy, a little sweet, very simple to make, and absolutely delicious Whipped cream is an easy topping, although dulce de leche or another warm, caramel-y sauce takes it to a special place But it’s also kind of nice plain, wrapped in waxed paper and tucked inside someone’s lunch.
title: Dark Molasses Gingerbread With Whipped Cream
title_page: Dark Molasses Gingerbread With Whipped Cream Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This gingerbread, from the chefs Edna Lewis and Scott Peacock, is just wonderful: a little spicy, a little sweet, very simple to make, and absolutely delicious. Whipped cream is an easy topping, although dulce de leche or another warm, caramel-y sauce takes it to a special place. But it’s also kind of nice plain, wrapped in waxed paper and tucked inside someone’s lunch.
Featured in: A Mexican Feast With Artisanal Technique.
